bibl.title: Labor Contracts from the Harthotes Archive
bibl.note: The Archive of Harthotes and His Descendents. - Life Cycles of an Egyptian Family. - Social and Economic Status of the Family. - Children, Family, and Labor: Three New Service Contracts. - Form of the Contracts. - 1. P. Mich. Inv. 4299. Service Contract for Marsisouchos. Theadelpheia, 20/19 BCE. - 2. P. Mich. Inv. 4436g + 4344. Work Contract. Theadelpheia, 12/11 BCE. - 3. P. Mich. Inv. 4346 + 4446f. Theadelpheia, 15 (or 17) October, 7 CE. - 4. P. Mich. Inv. 931 + P. Col. X, 249. Theadelpheia (written in Philagris), 4 April, 10 CE. - Appendix: The Harthotes Archive: List of Texts.
bibl.seg: W. Graham Claytor, Nikos Litinas & Elizabeth Nabney, Labor Contracts from the Harthotes Archive.
